This activity allows users to record and enhance videos, adjust playback speed, add effects, sound, text, music, and post videos.
com.ss.android.ugc.aweme.search.pages.co: The activity mainly show the result of search.
com.ss.android.ugc.aweme.splash.SplashAc: This activity involves various tasks such as searching for contacts, playing, pausing, liking, sharing, and reporting videos, as well as managing user profiles and interactions(following list, follower, like,favorites,private,draft).
com.ss.android.ugc.aweme.host.TikTokHost: The page allows users to manage system notifications, account updates, and customize notification settings.
com.ss.android.ugc.aweme.setting.ui.Sett: User accounts, content, display settings, etc.
